runs.comm: short-of-a-length on Kusal's legs. He turns it in front of square on the on side, for a couple.
bludgeoned! Mashrafe fires this wide, back-of-a-length. Kusal gets set and bashes this over  mid off area to the straight boundary.
fuller, closer into the stumps. This is turned away to third man for a single.
full, pitching on middle stump, Driven to midwicket, where it is fielded cleanly.
full, pitching outside off stump. Dilshan doesn't bother moving his feet, but drives it somewhat gently to cover

gone! Ambitious shot when you're not yet off the mark. Dilshan tries to play the over-the-shoulder scoop to Mash, but the bowler has slowed it down. It pitches around middle, Dilshan misjudges the pace, and it crashes into middle and off. Big strike first over. The crowd is delirious.
a little bit of air, pitches on middle. Kusal shuffles forward and hits it through midwicket. Misfield allows two
length ball, outside off. Opens the face to get it to short third man.
a little more air, pitched on leg stump, and that's swept powerfully and aerially behind square for four
length ball again, outside off stump, Kusal comes forward and is struck on the pad
shuffles forward again, struck on the pad again. Gazi appeals but he's too far down the track
squirted away through midwicket off the inside edge
length outside off stump, Mash beats a booming drive
doesn't beat the drive this time. Crunching stroke from Perera as Mash pitches it up. The ball goes screaming through cover-point
shorter and wider. Kusal is not slowing down. Tries to pull this over midwicket, but doesn't get much power into the shot. Still gives him two
length on off stump, driven to cover. Thought of a run, but decide against it
length ball again, driven wide of mid off
length on the pads, Chandimal turns it straight to short-fine leg, but no time for a single
beautiful placement. Kusal fetches this from way outside off stump and gets it in between square leg and short fine leg. He motors on
and again. This time Gazi pitches on middle stump, meaning Perera can get even more power on the shot. Through that same gap behind square leg again.
this time he goes through wicket. Strides down the pitch, and blasts this through midwicket. Super shot, again very good placement. This guy has some eye!
four in a row. Probably the best shot so far. Down the pitch again. This is hammered over midwicket, one bounce and to the fence. Where does Gazi go now?
just a single this time. Length ball on the legs, Turned behind square.
Chandimal gets off the mark with a single to long on, off a fullish ball
length on off stump. Chandimal squirts this wide of midwicket and hands the strike over to Kusal.
full, pitched outside leg, Kusal just pushes this square on the leg side, into a gap
Chandi is not content to let Kusal have all the fun. That is a massive strike, first of the match. Having promoted himself, he launches a full delivery over wide mid-on. Will give him some confidence
some luck now. Mash pitches it short-of-a-lenghth. Chandi plays a sort of ungainly cut. The ball takes an outside edge and flies where first slip would have been.
super shot. Mashrafe pitches wide and full, Chandi gets low and crashes it through the covers, all along the ground.
fullish again, on the stumps. Flicked to midwicket, who has to do a bit of work, allowing the single
length ball on off stump, crunched straight to cover
and just as I praise him, he comes down the pitch and plays an ungainly swipe to a short-of-a-length ball. Misses.
cuts him in half with a short ball. Chandimal doesn't connect with the pull
good stuff by Rubel. Angled into off stump, length ball. Chandimal is less ambitious, but he can't push it past midwicket.
short, gets the pull this time, but there's a deep backward square-leg to clean up the aerial stroke
length ball, driven to mid off and the batsmen scramble one.
length ball outside leg stump, no turn. This is nudged around the corner to short-fine-leg
floated up wide of off stump, Chandi chops down, but it's straight to point
slow again, Chandimal comes down the pitch and can't get anything more than pad to it
length ball on the pads, clipped square, thought of a second, but it's not there

he hadn't played a decent shot after I talked him up, and he now perishes, holing out to long off. Chandimal ran down the pitch and tried to smash it for six, but he didn't have enough power in the shot. Fielder at long on leaps and takes it just inside the ropes.
slow again, pitched on middle, straightening. Sanga goes back and pushes it wide of midwicket

oh, so close to being a wicket, but he gets five for that instead. He drove a full ball straight to mid off and took off for a single. Mash at mid off took a shy at the stumps and would probably have run him out if he hit. Instead it goes for four overthrows
length outside off stump, opens the face to get it behind backward point
first bouncer of the day, well directed. Sanga ducks it
ugly shot, but well worth it for Sanga. A length ball on middle is muscled over straight-ish midwicket, and all the way to the fence. Played that shot a lot in the last Test
length outside off, Sanga just fends this wide of cover, and this is a comfortable single
another good bouncer, only Kusal doesn't duck it. He tries to hook and gets it in the side of the helmet. The ball deflects past the keeper and speeds away to the fine-third man boundary.

oh what a catch! It takes something special to dismiss Sanga at this ground, and Nasir Hossain provides just that. Sanga rocks back and plays that straight-ish pull that brought him about a billion runs in the Test match here. But this time, Shakib has got a man out there and Nasir sprints full tilt to his right about seven metres in from the fence, then throws himself to intercept the ball mid air.
fullish ball, hit back to the bowler
length ball outside leg, shoveled away on the leg side again
length ball on the pads, Prasanna squirts this off the inside half of the bat on to the on side
lovely, delicate late-cut dissects the men behind square on the leg side. Not much power though, so it doesn't go to the fence
length ball on middle, worked away of the pads straight of midwicket again
length ball outside off stump, driven to long on for one
fired flat on middle stump, and that's really good running to get two. He had hit that straight past the bowler, but sets off for a couple straight away
fullish again, a little more air. Driven to long off now.
length on the legs, turning in. Clipped away to the midwicket region, wide enough of the fielder.

gone, Nasir gets another catch and Sunny gets a wicket in his first over. Sri Lanka sliding here after such a good start. Sunny gives it some air and pitches on middle and leg. Prasanna goes for a big slog sweep, but can't get enough elevation. Nasir is waiting for it at deep-backward square. Swallows it with ease.
full and flat, on middle stump. Mathews pushes it back to the bowler.
length outside off, muscled past the bowler for a single and that takes him to a fifty off 32 balls.
full ball on the stump, whipped away straight of midwicket. Mathews is off the mark.
fired way down leg stump. Wide called.
full and just wide of off stump. Kusal drives it hard, gets it past wide mid off and there's enough space to get two
slower ball on middle stump, Kusal chops it away square on the leg side. Just seems to know where every gap is. Great batting.
length ball on middle, Mathews swats it down the ground for one
another single. Kusal knows he has to stick around. Fullish ball, driven to mid on.
shortish, on off stump and straightening. Kusal chops it down to long on.
very good shout. Hits Mathews in front of leg stump with a fullish, straight delivery. But it might be going down leg.
more overthrows. Mathews clips this without much power into a big gap on the leg side. They scamper two and an overthrow gives one more
full, flighted and on leg stump. Kusal just wants singles for now. Gets it past midwicket
another straight one fired flat. Mathews works it into that same midwicket gap
wide down the leg side
Kusal shuffles forward, but Sunny pushes it through quickly. Batsman just defends in the end
length ball on off stump, Mathews gets forward and turns it into the gap at midwicket again
hit on the pads, but it's pitched ouside leg and probably missing leg as well. The deflection doesn't go far, but Kusal is a livewire between the wickets.
a beautifully-struck pick up shot. That's just damn good timing. It's a full ball pitched on leg, Kusal whips this square over the leg side, and it lands about a metre beyond the ropes
hits him on the pads with a slower, length ball. But that's pitched outside leg as well.
length ball outside off stump. Kusal drives on the up, all the way to long off
slower ball again, full on the stumps. Mathews mines that gap at midwicket once more, and Kusal scampers back for two. This is excellent from Sri Lanka after they lost a few quick ones.
turned wide of midwicket
floated up outside off stump, Mathews drives to mid on

what a catch again. Anamul Haque this time, and it's a huge one for Bangladesh. Kusal dances down and tries to slap Sunny over the midwicket fence, but Anamul jumps high, intercepts the ball above his head and keeps his balance, on one leg,  just a few inches from the rope.
single to mid on
floated on on off stump. Pushed into an offside gap near cover
single on the leg side
short-of-a-length outside off stump. Rubel beats Perera's shot
short ball at the body, Perera fends it away in to a gap

massive mix up. Mathews is lost somewhere near the non-strikers end. There might be a difficult word or two in the dressing room after this. Mathews drives it to midwicket and sets off straight away, calling Thisara through. But though Thisara responds in the affirmative and takes a few strides down the pitch, he suddenly decides against it and turns back. Only, by now, Mathews is almost at the non-striker's end. He is easily run out and leaves the field, shaking his head
Length on off stump, pushed into the off side.
shirt ball, pulled aerially but safely square on the leg side
length on the stumps, clipped square again, on the ground this time. Just a single.
length ball, turned into the leg side for a single
fired flatter, on the stumps. Perera pushes this towards midwicket as well
flighted outside off, driven to mid on
pushed through slow in the air again, pitching ouside off. Perera works it gently through midwicket
straighter, not much turn. Kulasekara finds midwicket with his push
straight ball, pitching outisd off. Kulasekara tries to work it on the leg side, but is too early on the shot and the leading edge dribbles down the pitch
full, wide outside off. Perera reaches out and hauls it from way out there to mid on, where there's a gap
floated up outside off stump, Kulasekara just prods this away and there's plenty of space in the offside infield
bludgeons this one down the ground, and a misfield at long off allows two
arm ball on around middle, Kule clips it straight of midwicket and gets the single
arm ball on around middle, Kule clips it straight of midwicket and gets the single

this might be out! Thisara drills this down to long on a little two well, but for some reason, the batsmen try for a second. Kulasekara pulls the dive out, and it just saves him. If it had been a direct hit, he was out of here as well.
backs away and hacks at this one, gets it way high over long off. Too far away for any fielders to get under it, and it dribbles over the fence
shortish ball outside off stump, Kule backs away and swings but can't connect
attempted bouncer, but that's over head-high
full ball on the stumps, drilled down to long on
full again, thumped to long on with a slightly cross-bat
drilled hard again. Kule makes room and hits it wide of long on, but the fielder runs around and cuts it off with a tumbling save
makes room again, and Rubel fires another full one in. This is driven square on the off side.
gets that to long on
slow outside off stump, and that's slogged, almost slog-swept to long on
that's a classic Kulasekara shot. Length ball and that's launched off one knee into the long-on stands
fuller and wider of the off stump, hit aerially to deep point
pushed through slightly quicker. Perera can't get a hold of it, but still manages a single down to long on.
length ball, but this is pushed through quickly. Heaved away to deep midwicket
that's all the way again. Nice clean hitting from Kule. Mash pitches it full outside off stump. Kule opens his front hip and launches that straight, and it lands just short of the sightscreen
on the pads this time, turned away square on the leg side
full and wide, chopped away straight to third man.
slower ball does him in. That's short-of-a-length on the stumps, Kule tries to pull it away but ends up hitting it high, not hard. Man at deep square leg settles nicely under it.
yorker outside off, Perera opens the face and gets it past short-third man for a couple
not quite a yorker, but Perera doesn't get under it. He thumps that to long off, and Sachithra Senanayake sprints back in time to the non-striker's end to complete a couple.
